intro.p: ActiveRecord exposes some events that you might use to integrate it with a top level framework.

section.title: ActiveRecordStarter.SessionFactoryHolderCreated
section.p: You can subscribe to this event to get notification about the creation of a ISessionFactoryHolder instance implementation.

section.title: ISessionFactoryHolder.OnRootTypeRegistered
section.p: You can subscribe to this event to get notification when a root type is registered. A root type defines the database being used. If you are using only one database the root type will be ActiveRecordBase.
